instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

definitions.820-00163: What is 820-00163? a LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER.

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-00163</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> fan spin, no chime
threads.message:
Display got no backlight.
No Caps Lock LED.
USB mouse light OK.
PRAM reset via USB keyboard is not working.

CPU gets hot.

Tried <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-00163</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> clean ME fixed SSN.bin but no luck.

Any idea?

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-00163</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> fan spin, no chime
threads.message:
Any history available?

May have GPU problems, if it was stressed.

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-00163</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> fan spin, no chime
threads.message: No history I am afraid. Client said just stopped working.
